name: The Inner Demons
description: The Inner Demons is the first game in a new genre of “Cinematically Cut Games”. Using carefully crafted camera systems, The Inner Demons allows players to watch the character through a perspective that cuts and seamlessly transitions between cinematic camera angles and movement while still allowing the player to retain full control. The game uses an unusual room-relative movement system, so travel is not interrupted when the camera cuts. In The Inner Demons, players control Ilia, a girl who wakes up to find that her house is not as she remembers. To survive, she must traverse shadow-filled rooms and escape the watch of powerful shadow-makers. Explore a unique horror game through a cinematic lens in this innovative interactive experience.
